Uses of Class
gui.GameEnvironment

Packages that use GameEnvironment
Package
Description
day
This package contains classes that define each day of the game - Battle.java, Day.java, and Shop.java
gui
This package contains the GameEnvironment, and all the GUI classes.
player
This package contains information that is unique to the player - classes Inventory, Player, PlayerScore and Team.
random_event
Random Events package containing all the logic for running random events.
